mapper.sql:
SELECT T1.ORG_ID AS orgId, T1.DISTRICT_ID AS districtId, T1.ORG_NAME AS orgName, T1.PARENT_ORG_ID AS parentOrgId, T1.ORG_LEADER AS orgLeader, T1.REMARK AS remark, T1.DEL_FLAG AS delFlag, T2.USER_NAME AS addUserId, T1.ADD_TIME AS addTime, T3.USER_NAME AS updateUserId, T1.UPDATE_TIME AS updateTime FROM sys_org T1 LEFT JOIN sys_user T2 ON T2.USER_ID = T1.ADD_USER_ID LEFT JOIN sys_user T3 ON T3.USER_ID = T1.UPDATE_USER_ID WHERE 1=1
AND T1.ORG_NAME like '%${orgName}%'
AND T1.REMARK like '%${remark}%'
ORDER BY T1.ORG_ID
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sys_org ( DISTRICT_ID, ORG_NAME, PARENT_ORG_ID, ORG_LEADER, REMARK, DEL_FLAG, ADD_USER_ID, ADD_TIME, UPDATE_USER_ID, UPDATE_TIME, VERSION ) VALUES( #{districtId}, #{orgName}, #{parentOrgId}, #{orgLeader}, #{remark}, #{delFlag}, #{sys_user}, NOW(), #{sys_user}, NOW(), 0 )
mapper.select: SELECT T1.ORG_ID AS orgId, T1.DISTRICT_ID AS districtId, T1.ORG_NAME AS orgName, T1.PARENT_ORG_ID AS parentOrgId, T1.ORG_LEADER AS orgLeader, T1.REMARK AS remark, T1.DEL_FLAG AS delFlag, T1.ADD_USER_ID AS addUserId, T1.ADD_TIME AS addTime, T1.UPDATE_USER_ID AS updateUserId, T1.UPDATE_TIME AS updateTime FROM sys_org T1 WHERE T1.ORG_ID = #{orgId}
mapper.update: UPDATE sys_org SET DISTRICT_ID #{districtId}, ORG_NAME = #{orgName}, PARENT_ORG_ID #{parentOrgId}, ORG_LEADER #{orgLeader}, REMARK #{remark}, DEL_FLAG #{delFlag}, UPDATE_USER_ID = #{sys_user}, UPDATE_TIME = NOW(), VERSION = VERSION + 1 WHERE ORG_ID=#{orgId}
